welcome.general: Hey! I'm Finix, your AI career assistant. I can help you with CVs, cover letters, interview prep and much more. What can I do for you?
welcome.dashboard: Hey! I'm Finix. Here you can see your stats at a glance. Want me to help you analyze your progress or suggest next steps?

welcome.jobSearch: Hey! I'm Finix. Looking for jobs? I can help you refine your search or analyze how well a posting matches your profile.
welcome.profile: Hi! I'm Finix. A complete profile unlocks all AI features. Need help writing your professional summary or describing your experience?
welcome.settings: Hi! I'm Finix. Need help configuring the APIs? I can guide you through the setup step by step.
